channel.title: [PI]Quest Tab
channel.description: How do i switch my quest tab from client sided to server sided i cant find any tutorial's how can someone please help me.

item.title: [PI]Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

[quote=“jeff9229, post:3, topic:444371”]okay done talking to you cause i already did that shit[/quote]Then why didn’t you say any of this? How am I or anyone else supposed to know what you have or haven’t done? Don’t be such a stuck up tight ass. You’re the one who needs help.

EDIT: Well I looked up 2 different tutorials and one of them said to put it under the process() method, which I don’t think sounds right, and the other one said to put it under the handleLogin in your playerAssistant class. So I guess try them.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

Where did you paste that? I think it needs to go under the login process, or create a new method and call that method under the login process.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

[quote=“jeff9229, post:1, topic:444371”]i have to edit it in the client sided part i dont want it like that i want to add it so i can edit it in server sided instead[/quote]What have you tried so far?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

What do you mean? Changing it to a different tab / interface? All you need to do is change what interface it sends upon login.

Read full topic
